short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wutch.net allows you to track any value on the Web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wutch.net is a web application which can help you to track websites. It will subscribe to a value you're interested in and then send you updates when that value changes.
